title: 后台狂刷一个指令 求帮助
author: qq502024528
txt_content:
27.12 17:50:55 [Server] INFO Received a tiny packet for network id 37 that is not recognised here  
后台矿刷这个 请问是什么原因

replies.author: HGK
replies.txt_content:
27.12 17:50:55 [服务器]  信息收到一个小数据包网络id 37,这里不认可。
翻译不谢

replies.txt_content:
